DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , double-blind study receive permission Local Research Ethics Committee obtain patient ' informed consent , 103 patient American society anesthesiologist ( ASA ) classification group I-II , 18-65 year , undergo elective surgery indication supraglottic airway device placement include study . All patient preoperatively evaluate ASA Mallampati classification record . All SGAD 's insert experience researcher . After placement laryngeal mask , standardize postoperative pharyngeal morbidity , cuff pressure ( cuff pressure manometer , Ruch , Germany ) monitor . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : - Any neck upper respiratory pathology - Those risk gastric content regurgitation/aspiration ( previous upper Gastro-intestinal surgery , know hiatus hernia , Gastroesophageal reflux , history peptic ulcer , full stomach , pregnancy ) - Possibility history difficult intubation ( history impossible intubation , Mallampati classification 3-4 , sterno mental distance le 12 cm , thyromental distance le 6 cm , head extension le 90 degree , mouth open less 1.5 cm ) - Those low pulmonary compliance high airway resistance ( morbid obesity , lung disease ) - Throat pain , dysphagia dysphonia - Patients cervical disc hernia Patients take operating room give standard monitoring anesthesia induction . Patients preoxygenated 6 L/min oxygen 3 minute face mask . Anesthesia induction provide 0.02 mg/kg midazolam , 1-2 mcg/kg fentanyl , 1.5-2 mg/kg propofol 0.5 mg/kg rocuronium . All patient neuromuscular junction monitoring ( TOF-GUARD , Biometer International A.S. DENMARK ) TOF zero SGAD inserted standard method accord firm 's recommendation . During SGAD placement , necessary additional dose 0.5 mg/kg propofol give depend patient reaction . During procedure case ventilate 100 % oxygen though mask . STUDY GROUPS : Group U ( UNIQUE ) : LMA- UNIQUE , insert accord described standard method Group I ( I-GEL ) : I-GEL , inserted standard technique accord user manual For LMA-U laryngeal mask cuff inflate cuff pressure le 60 cm H2O leak preventive volume . After operation laryngeal mask remove cuff pressure measure record . To check SGAD placement bilateral chest movement observe capnography use confirm square wave shape . After SGAD place oropharyngeal leak test complete . Oropharyngeal leak pressure test group first neutral head position , maximum extension head maximum rotation right . In every position leak measurement make 60 second position change . In order prevent SGAD see researcher test patient 's head cover . Oropharyngeal leak pressure measure ring system expiratory valve close 4 L/min flow . To prevent exposure lung barotrauma , peak airway pressure reach 40 cm H2O expiratory valve open . Leak pressure evaluate two way ; 1 . The stethoscope place patient 's leave thyroid part trachea sound leak listen 2 . Checked aneroid manometer hold steady ( manometer stability test ) When sound leak heard , pressure manometer record separately situation . Anesthesia maintain 5 % O2/air mix 1.5-2.5 % sevoflurane . Systolic arterial pressure ( SAP ) , diastolic arterial pressure ( DAP ) , mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) , heart rate ( HR ) value measure record immediately anesthesia induction , immediately airway device placement 1 , 2 , 3 minute airway placement check . The time successful placement ( duration mouth open first successful ventilation ) , number attempt , ease placement record . Ease insertion : 1. reaction 2. straining , retch 3. alternative airway management The Mallampati score , type supraglottic airway device , type operation total duration anesthesia record . Any problem occur head neck position note . The cuff pressure measure surgery patient still deep anesthesia . When patient conscious SGAD remove duration use record ( time insertion removal ) . After SGAD remove presence blood evaluate 1. blood 2. trace amount blood 3. definite amount blood The patient throat pain , voice loss difficulty swallow evaluate leaving recovery room telephone 24 hour later researcher blind insertion technique . To evaluate throat pain VAS 10 ( verbal analogue scale ) use EXPULSION CRITERIA : - Oxygen saturation pulse oximetry value fall 90 % airway insertion - Cases develop laryngospasm - Cases incomplete record
